artview.components.Menu¶

class artview.components.Menu(pathDir=None, filename=None, Vradar=None, Vgrid=None, Vfilelist=None, mode=['Radar'], name='Menu', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Class to display the MainMenu.

__init__(pathDir=None, filename=None, Vradar=None, Vgrid=None, Vfilelist=None, mode=['Radar'], name='Menu', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

pathDir : string

Input directory path to open. If None user current directory

filename : string, False or None

File to open as first. None will open file dialog. False will open no file.

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

Vgrid : Variable instance

Grid signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

mode : list

List with strings “Radar” or “Grid”. Determine which type of files will be open

name : string

Menu name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to menu. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Notes

This class creates the main application interface and creates a menubar for the program.

Methods

Menu.AdvanceFileSelect(findex) Captures a selection and open file.
Menu.CreateMenu() Create the main menubar.
Menu.LaunchApp() Launches a GUI interface.
Menu.addComponent(Comp[, label]) Add Component Contructor. If label is None, use class name.
Menu.addFileAdvanceMenu() Add menu to advance to next or previous file.
Menu.addFileMenu() Add the File Menu to menubar.
Menu.addLayoutMenu() Add Layout Menu to menubar.
Menu.addLayoutMenuItem(widget) Add widget item to Layout Menu.
Menu.addLayoutWidget(widget) Add a widget to central layout.
Menu.addMenuAction(position, *args)
Menu.addPluginMenuItem(Comp[, label]) Add Component item to Component Menu.
Menu.change_mode(new_mode) Open and connect new components to satisfy mode.
Menu.keyPressEvent(event) Change data file with left and right arrow keys.
Menu.menus()
Menu.removeLayoutMenuItem(widget) Remove widget item from Layout Menu.
Menu.removeLayoutWidget(widget) Remove widget from central layout.
Menu.removeTab(idx)
Menu.saveGrid() Open a dialog box to save grid file.
Menu.saveRadar() Open a dialog box to save radar file.
Menu.showFileDialog() Open a dialog box to choose file.
Menu.startComponent(Comp) Execute the GUI start of Component and
Menu.subMenus(menu) get submenu list of menu as dictionary.

see Shared Variables Table
